bug.author: wooksong
bug.summary: [Tests/Filter/Python] Some of the test cases for python extensions fails on armv7l/aarch64
bug.description:
$ git log --oneline -n1 05e0f4b (HEAD -> master, upstream/master, upstream/HEAD) [Test] Fix tizen capi unittest
$ gbs build -A aarch64 --define "unit_test 1" --define "testcoverage 1" ...omission... [ 241s] ~/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2/build/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter ~/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2/build ~/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2 [ 241s] ~/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2/build ~/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2 [ 241s] ./tests/nnstreamer_filter_extensions_common/unittest_tizen_python2-get [ 241s] [==========] Running 13 tests from 1 test case. [ 241s] [----------] Global test environment set-up. [ 241s] [----------] 13 tests from nnstreamer_python2_basic_functions [ 241s] [ RUN ] nnstreamer_python2_basic_functions.check_existence [ 242s] [ OK ] nnstreamer_python2_basic_functions.check_existence (93 ms) [ 242s] [ RUN ] nnstreamer_python2_basic_functions.open_close_00_n [ 242s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 235 [ 242s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 235 [ 242s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 235 [ 242s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 235 [ 242s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 235 [ 242s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 235 [ 242s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 235 [ 242s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 235 [ 242s] qemu: uncaught target signal 11 (Segmentation fault) - core dumped [ 242s] /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2/packaging/run_unittests_binaries.sh: line 19: 28434 Segmentation fault ${entry} --gst-plugin-path=. --gtest_output="xml:${entry##*/}.xml" [ 242s] ~/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2 [ 242s] error: Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.I3M4Uk (%build) [ 242s] [ 242s] [ 242s] RPM build errors: [ 242s] Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.I3M4Uk (%build) [ 242s] [ 242s] wook-ubuntu failed "build nnstreamer.spec" at Fri Apr 24 12:04:05 UTC 2020.
$ gbs build -A armv7l --define "unit_test 1" --define "testcoverage 1" ...omission... [ 284s] [==========] Running 13 tests from 1 test case. [ 284s] [----------] Global test environment set-up. [ 284s] [----------] 13 tests from nnstreamer_python2_basic_functions [ 284s] [ RUN ] nnstreamer_python2_basic_functions.check_existence [ 284s] [ OK ] nnstreamer_python2_basic_functions.check_existence (103 ms) [ 284s] [ RUN ] nnstreamer_python2_basic_functions.open_close_00_n [ 284s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 319 [ 284s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 319 [ 284s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 319 [ 284s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 319 [ 284s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 319 [ 284s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 319 [ 284s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 319 [ 284s] qemu: Unsupported syscall: 319 [ 284s] qemu: uncaught target signal 11 (Segmentation fault) - core dumped [ 284s] /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2/packaging/run_unittests_binaries.sh: line 19: 31564 Segmentation fault ${entry} --gst-plugin-path=. --gtest_output="xml:${entry##*/}.xml" [ 284s] ~/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-1.5.2 [ 284s] error: Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.FTQjz2 (%build) [ 284s] [ 284s] [ 284s] RPM build errors: [ 284s] Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.FTQjz2 (%build) [ 284s] [ 284s] wook-ubuntu failed "build nnstreamer.spec" at Fri Apr 24 12:13:54 UTC 2020.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2317>#2317</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
